item.title: Fan, 07/31, Inktober 2021
item.description: I’ve been a Nintendo fan since I was 7 years old and my bro bought a SNES. Over the last decade the Nintendo 3DS has become a contender for my all-time favourite console. This is my SNES edition 3DS XL and it’s one of my most treasured belongings! 🤓 Source: from life.
